column4: how to paste /boot/grub/menu.lst  in pastebin? i dont know much about linux
type the next message I write in a terminal
then go to http://paste.ubuntu.com and paste it in there, then hit send.  it'll give you a new page, copy the URL of that page and paste it in here
here is the lint where i pasted http://paste.ubuntu.com/38421/
congratulations, you've successfully pastebinned.
so what next or is my prob be finnished?

that was just to tell me what your problem was.  Here's the thing, you have 2 Kernels.  you should have only one, I'll show you how to remove the other, you might have to reinstall some apps when you do, but it'll fix it
